channel.title: Still need help! with postion on shops
channel.description:
what file can i find my shops under like the coords for it where it is at in my sever. if u get what im saying
edit: what file can i find my postion of my shops

item.title: Still need help! with postion on shops
item.dc:creator: @bifocaler bifocaler
item.description:
@bifocaler wrote:

[quote=“early, post:4, topic:344252”]to do this its kinda hard if your new and im on a 317 delta so if you are on something like that to try this. open up shops.cfg look for the shop you want to know the cords the shop should have a number like for example. 50 = staffzone_shop or w.e yours in. then go into client.java and search WanneShop = 50 <-- your number there. then you should see something like this } else if (NPCID == 1917) {
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 50; // Staffzone shop

then serch the npcid mine is 1917. btw thats the npc that you trade to see that shop. ok so serch 1917 in autospawn.cfg. if theres only one then theres your cords for that shop.
hope this helps :)[/quote]ok ty it works mine delta to

Read full topic
item.source: Still need help! with postion on shops

item.title: Still need help! with postion on shops
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

to do this its kinda hard if your new and im on a 317 delta so if you are on something like that to try this. open up shops.cfg look for the shop you want to know the cords the shop should have a number like for example. 50 = staffzone_shop or w.e yours in. then go into client.java and search WanneShop = 50 <-- your number there. then you should see something like this } else if (NPCID == 1917) {
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 50; // Staffzone shop

then serch the npcid mine is 1917. btw thats the npc that you trade to see that shop. ok so serch 1917 in autospawn.cfg. if theres only one then theres your cords for that shop.
hope this helps

Read full topic
